https://luplab.gitlab.io/rvcodecjs/#q=addi+x1,+x0,+5&abi=false&isa=AUTO

00000000010100000000000010010011 //addi x1, x0, 5
00000000000100010110000110110011 //or x3, x2, x1
00000000000100001000000010010011 //addi x1, x1, 1



addi x1, x0, 100
addi x2, x0, 42
sw x2, 0(x1)
lw x5, 0(x1)
add  x6, x5, x3
